citation.title: The wall of fame : New York City's legendary Manny's Music

blogs.title: RIP Manny&#8217;s: A big piece of NYC music history was just cleared for demolition
blogs.summary: It was a favorite shopping spot for famous musicians from Buddy Holly and the Beatles to Bob Marley and Jimi Hendrix, and now the building is set to be pummeled into a purple haze. The former site of Manny’s Music at 156 West 48th Street in Manh
